definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
see 直髮器|直发器[zhi2 fa4 qi4]

sentences.english: For girls with straight hair, you can let your fingers run through it.
sentences.chinese: 对那些留着直发的女孩子，你可以让你的手穿入其中。

sentences.english: She has high nose, jet-black straight hair hang down her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她高鼻梁，乌黑的直发垂下她的腰部。

sentences.english: Waist of a straight hair, and the five car-fu school.
sentences.chinese: 一头齐腰的直发，而且学富五车。

sentences.english: Instead of straight locks, this bob works well with wavy or crimped hair.
sentences.chinese: 取代直发，这种波波头很适合波浪状或者卷曲的头发。

sentences.english: The way his stringy black hair moves jerkily into his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他黑色的直发猛地一甩遮住他眼睛时的样子。

sentences.english: This paper is used only for applying for inspection or certificate-change of directly exported commodities.
sentences.chinese: 此单仅用于直发出口商品的检验或换证申报。

sentences.english: I have had straight, black hair for the last 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 过去的20年我一直留着黑色直发。

sentences.english: Blandi said the previous straight-hair trend dictated almost no movement.
sentences.chinese: 布兰迪说，此前的直发潮流几乎没有动感的概念可言。

sentences.english: Before, the hair was almost attached to the skull," he said.
sentences.chinese: 之前，直发几乎都是紧贴着头皮的。

sentences.english: Quickly smooth coarse and messy hair, present silky and flying charm of straight hair.
sentences.chinese: 快速抚平毛糙乱翘的秀发，展现直发柔顺飞扬的魅力。

sentences.english: She wanted straight hair like us.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢像我们这样的直发。

sentences.english: Diffuse those hazy dusk, waiting for children straighteners hair to sleep on.
sentences.chinese: 朦胧弥漫的黄昏，直发儿童睡在等待。

sentences.english: In the black community, long, straight hair is often considered more beautiful than short kinky hair.
sentences.chinese: 在黑人社会，长长的直发通常被认为比短的卷发漂亮。

sentences.english: Straight hair needs a daily deep-cleaning shampoo.
sentences.chinese: 直发需要每日使用深层洁净洗发乳。

sentences.english: Potato juice is NOT a practical way to straighten your hair.
sentences.chinese: 用土豆汁来直发可算不上一个好法子了。

sentences.english: Her hair—in the picture it is curly. And more fair.
sentences.chinese: 不像，照片上是卷发，而她是直发，你怎么解释？

definition: Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
level with one's shoulders/(of two people) both the same height
cape/shawl/(of long hair) to trail over one's shoulders
to part one's hair in the middle
